sourcesContent:
import { lighten, darken } from '../../utils/color'
import { transitions } from '../../constants'
import { themeColors } from '../../constants'

const styles = {
  display: 'inline-block',
  fontSize: '1rem',
  borderColor: themeColors.primaryColor,
  backgroundColor: themeColors.primaryColor,
  color: 'white',
  position: 'relative',
  textAlign: 'center',
  borderRadius: '4px',
  cursor: 'pointer',
  whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
  touchAction: 'manipulation',
  userSelect: 'none',
  outline: '0',
  padding: '0.25rem 1.25rem',

  transition: `all ${transitions.standardTiming} ${transitions.standardCubic}`,

  ':hover': {
    backgroundColor: lighten(themeColors.primaryColor, 0.3),
    borderColor: lighten(themeColors.primaryColor, 0.3)
  },

  ':focus': {
    backgroundColor: darken(themeColors.primaryColor, 0.1),
    borderColor: darken(themeColors.primaryColor, 0.1)
  },

  ':active': {
    backgroundColor: darken(themeColors.primaryColor, 0.2),
    borderColor: darken(themeColors.primaryColor, 0.2)
  }
}

export default styles
